sentence.Network_en: Arithmetically: 10 % for the Intermezzo Giocoso is equal to 100 % for the Serenata.
sentence.Network_cn: 从算术上看: Gisoco间奏曲10%的水平等于小夜曲100%的水平.

sentence.Network_en: Unrealistically, you may try to play the Intermezzo Giocoso by practising 30 minutes every day.
sentence.Network_cn: 你可能会每天练习30分钟,然后不切实际的尝试着去演奏“Gisoco间奏曲”.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...一个紧密的结构里。钢琴小曲最常用的标题是：即兴曲（impromptu）、小曲（bagatelle）、间奏曲（intermezzo）、夜曲（nocturne）、新事曲（novelette）、音乐瞬间、无言歌、册页、前奏曲、浪漫曲、随.
intermezzi 幕间剧intermezzo 间歇曲intermigration 互相迁徒

list.abs: the chrysanthemum , an afro-american intermezzo菊花，美国黑人间奏曲

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from Italian, from Latin intermedium 'interval', neuter of intermedius (see intermediate)

encyclopedia.content: 间奏曲intermezzo 为歌剧或戏剧中的过场音乐或幕间曲；另一种为形式较自由篇幅较小的器乐曲

means.word_mean: 1. a short movement coming between the major sections of a symphony
2. a short piece of instrumental music composed for performance between acts of a drama or opera
3. a brief show (music or dance etc) performed between the sections of another performance
